price: نو له هغوى (يهودو) نه ځينو ايمان پرې راوړ او ځينو يې ډډه ترې وكړه او هماغه لمبه اور د جهنم بس دى.
arabic: فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن صَدَّ عَنۡهُۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: famin'hum man āmana bihi wamin'hum man ṣadda ʿanhu wakafā bijahannama saʿīran
